metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39317 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple integer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the LXT2num_dict_entries functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted.lxt2 file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need toopen a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerabilityconcerns the integer overflow when allocating the `string_lens` array.

criterions.comment: gtkwave: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
